definition: A portable timekeeping device worn on the wrist, typically consisting of a strap or band and a mechanism for displaying the time. It is commonly used for personal time management and as a fashion accessory.

examples.german: Kannst du mir deine Armbanduhr leihen?
examples.english: Can you lend me your wristwatch?

examples.german: Ich habe gestern eine neue Armbanduhr gekauft.
examples.english: I bought a new wristwatch yesterday.
